<a id="NavigationPolygon"></a>

# NavigationPolygon

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A 2D navigation mesh that describes a traversable surface for pathfinding.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A navigation mesh can be created either by baking it with the help of the [NavigationServer2D](NavigationServer2D.md), or by adding vertices and convex polygon indices arrays manually.

To bake a navigation mesh at least one outline needs to be added that defines the outer bounds of the baked area.




```gdscript
    var new_navigation_mesh = NavigationPolygon.new()
    var bounding_outline = PackedVector2Array([Vector2(0, 0), Vector2(0, 50), Vector2(50, 50), Vector2(50, 0)])
    new_navigation_mesh.add_outline(bounding_outline)
    NavigationServer2D.bake_from_source_geometry_data(new_navigation_mesh, NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData2D.new());
    $NavigationRegion2D.navigation_polygon = new_navigation_mesh
```


```csharp
    var newNavigationMesh = new NavigationPolygon();
    Vector2[] boundingOutline = [new Vector2(0, 0), new Vector2(0, 50), new Vector2(50, 50), new Vector2(50, 0)];
    newNavigationMesh.AddOutline(boundingOutline);
    NavigationServer2D.BakeFromSourceGeometryData(newNavigationMesh, new NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData2D());
    GetNode<NavigationRegion2D>("NavigationRegion2D").NavigationPolygon = newNavigationMesh;
```




Adding vertices and polygon indices manually.




```gdscript
    var new_navigation_mesh = NavigationPolygon.new()
    var new_vertices = PackedVector2Array([Vector2(0, 0), Vector2(0, 50), Vector2(50, 50), Vector2(50, 0)])
    new_navigation_mesh.vertices = new_vertices
    var new_polygon_indices = PackedInt32Array([0, 1, 2, 3])
    new_navigation_mesh.add_polygon(new_polygon_indices)
    $NavigationRegion2D.navigation_polygon = new_navigation_mesh
```


```csharp
    var newNavigationMesh = new NavigationPolygon();
    Vector2[] newVertices = [new Vector2(0, 0), new Vector2(0, 50), new Vector2(50, 50), new Vector2(50, 0)];
    newNavigationMesh.Vertices = newVertices;
    int[] newPolygonIndices = [0, 1, 2, 3];
    newNavigationMesh.AddPolygon(newPolygonIndices);
    GetNode<NavigationRegion2D>("NavigationRegion2D").NavigationPolygon = newNavigationMesh;
```




<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **SamplePartitionType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType)

<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SAMPLE_PARTITION_CONVEX_PARTITION"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SamplePartitionType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType) **SAMPLE_PARTITION_CONVEX_PARTITION** = `0`

Convex partitioning that yields navigation mesh with convex polygons.<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SAMPLE_PARTITION_TRIANGULATE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SamplePartitionType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType) **SAMPLE_PARTITION_TRIANGULATE** = `1`

Triangulation partitioning that yields navigation mesh with triangle polygons.<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SAMPLE_PARTITION_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SamplePartitionType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType) **SAMPLE_PARTITION_MAX** = `2`

<a id="enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ParsedGeometryType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType)

<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_MESH_INSTANCES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) **PARSED_GEOMETRY_MESH_INSTANCES** = `0`

Parses mesh instances as obstruction geometry. This includes [Polygon2D](Polygon2D.md), [MeshInstance2D](MeshInstance2D.md), [MultiMeshInstance2D](MultiMeshInstance2D.md), and [TileMap](TileMap.md) nodes.

Meshes are only parsed when they use a 2D vertices surface format.<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_STATIC_COLLIDERS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) **PARSED_GEOMETRY_STATIC_COLLIDERS** = `1`

Parses [StaticBody2D](StaticBody2D.md) and [TileMap](TileMap.md) colliders as obstruction geometry. The collider should be in any of the layers specified by [parsed_collision_mask](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_collision_mask).<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_BOTH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) **PARSED_GEOMETRY_BOTH** = `2`

Both [PARSED_GEOMETRY_MESH_INSTANCES](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_MESH_INSTANCES) and [PARSED_GEOMETRY_STATIC_COLLIDERS](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_STATIC_COLLIDERS).<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) **PARSED_GEOMETRY_MAX** = `3`

Represents the size of the [ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **SourceGeometryMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode)

<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SOURCE_GEOMETRY_ROOT_NODE_CHILDREN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) **SOURCE_GEOMETRY_ROOT_NODE_CHILDREN** = `0`

Scans the child nodes of the root node recursively for geometry.<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_WITH_CHILDREN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) **SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_WITH_CHILDREN** = `1`

Scans nodes in a group and their child nodes recursively for geometry. The group is specified by [source_geometry_group_name](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_group_name).<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_EXPLICIT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) **SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_EXPLICIT** = `2`

Uses nodes in a group for geometry. The group is specified by [source_geometry_group_name](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_group_name).<a id="NavigationPolygon_constant_SOURCE_GEOMETRY_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) **SOURCE_GEOMETRY_MAX** = `3`

Represents the size of the [SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_agent_radius"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **agent_radius** = `10.0` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_agent_radius)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_agent_radius**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_agent_radius**\ (\ )

The distance to erode/shrink the walkable surface when baking the navigation mesh.

\ **Note:** The radius must be equal or higher than ``0.0``. If the radius is ``0.0``, it won't be possible to fix invalid outline overlaps and other precision errors during the baking process. As a result, some obstacles may be excluded incorrectly from the final navigation mesh, or may delete the navigation mesh's polygons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Rect2](Rect2.md) **baking_rect** = `Rect2(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_baking_rect**\ (\ value\: [Rect2](Rect2.md)\ )
- [Rect2](Rect2.md) **get_baking_rect**\ (\ )

If the baking [Rect2](Rect2.md) has an area the navigation mesh baking will be restricted to its enclosing area.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **baking_rect_offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_baking_rect_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_baking_rect_offset**\ (\ )

The position offset applied to the [baking_rect](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect) [Rect2](Rect2.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_border_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **border_size** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_border_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_border_size**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_border_size**\ (\ )

The size of the non-navigable border around the bake bounding area defined by the [baking_rect](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect) [Rect2](Rect2.md).

In conjunction with the [baking_rect](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_baking_rect) the border size can be used to bake tile aligned navigation meshes without the tile edges being shrunk by [agent_radius](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_agent_radius).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_cell_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **cell_size** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_cell_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cell_size**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_cell_size**\ (\ )

The cell size used to rasterize the navigation mesh vertices. Must match with the cell size on the navigation map.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_collision_mask"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **parsed_collision_mask** = `4294967295` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_collision_mask)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_parsed_collision_mask**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_parsed_collision_mask**\ (\ )

The physics layers to scan for static colliders.

Only used when [parsed_geometry_type](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_geometry_type) is [PARSED_GEOMETRY_STATIC_COLLIDERS](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_STATIC_COLLIDERS) or [PARSED_GEOMETRY_BOTH](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_constant_PARSED_GEOMETRY_BOTH).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_geometry_type"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) **parsed_geometry_type** = `2` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_geometry_type)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_parsed_geometry_type**\ (\ value\: [ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType)\ )
- [ParsedGeometryType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_ParsedGeometryType) **get_parsed_geometry_type**\ (\ )

Determines which type of nodes will be parsed as geometry.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_sample_partition_type"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[SamplePartitionType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType) **sample_partition_type** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_sample_partition_type)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_sample_partition_type**\ (\ value\: [SamplePartitionType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType)\ )
- [SamplePartitionType](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SamplePartitionType) **get_sample_partition_type**\ (\ )

Partitioning algorithm for creating the navigation mesh polys.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_group_name"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **source_geometry_group_name** = `&"navigation_polygon_source_geometry_group"` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_group_name)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_source_geometry_group_name**\ (\ value\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ )
- [StringName](StringName.md) **get_source_geometry_group_name**\ (\ )

The group name of nodes that should be parsed for baking source geometry.

Only used when [source_geometry_mode](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_mode) is [SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_WITH_CHILDREN](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_constant_SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_WITH_CHILDREN) or [SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_EXPLICIT](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_constant_SOURCE_GEOMETRY_GROUPS_EXPLICIT).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) **source_geometry_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_property_source_geometry_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_source_geometry_mode**\ (\ value\: [SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode)\ )
- [SourceGeometryMode](NavigationPolygon.md#enum_NavigationPolygon_SourceGeometryMode) **get_source_geometry_mode**\ (\ )

The source of the geometry used when baking.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_add_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_outline**\ (\ outline\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_add_outline)

Appends a [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) that contains the vertices of an outline to the internal array that contains all the outlines.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_add_outline_at_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_outline_at_index**\ (\ outline\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md), index\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_add_outline_at_index)

Adds a [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) that contains the vertices of an outline to the internal array that contains all the outlines at a fixed position.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_add_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_polygon**\ (\ polygon\: [PackedInt32Array](PackedInt32Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_add_polygon)

Adds a polygon using the indices of the vertices you get when calling [get_vertices()](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_method_get_vertices).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_clear"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_clear)

Clears the internal arrays for vertices and polygon indices.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_clear_outlines"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_outlines**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_clear_outlines)

Clears the array of the outlines, but it doesn't clear the vertices and the polygons that were created by them.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_clear_polygons"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_polygons**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_clear_polygons)

Clears the array of polygons, but it doesn't clear the array of outlines and vertices.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_navigation_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[NavigationMesh](NavigationMesh.md) **get_navigation_mesh**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_navigation_mesh)

Returns the [NavigationMesh](NavigationMesh.md) resulting from this navigation polygon. This navigation mesh can be used to update the navigation mesh of a region with the [NavigationServer3D.region_set_navigation_mesh()](NavigationServer3D.md#NavigationServer3D_method_region_set_navigation_mesh) API directly.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_outline**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_outline)

Returns a [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) containing the vertices of an outline that was created in the editor or by script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_outline_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_outline_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_outline_count)

Returns the number of outlines that were created in the editor or by script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_parsed_collision_mask_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_parsed_collision_mask_value**\ (\ layer_number\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_parsed_collision_mask_value)

Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [parsed_collision_mask](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_collision_mask) is enabled, given a `layer_number` between 1 and 32.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_polygon"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedInt32Array](PackedInt32Array.md) **get_polygon**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_polygon)

Returns a [PackedInt32Array](PackedInt32Array.md) containing the indices of the vertices of a created polygon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_polygon_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_polygon_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_polygon_count)

Returns the count of all polygons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_get_vertices"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) **get_vertices**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_get_vertices)

Returns a [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md) containing all the vertices being used to create the polygons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_make_polygons_from_outlines"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **make_polygons_from_outlines**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_make_polygons_from_outlines)

**Deprecated:** Use [NavigationServer2D.parse_source_geometry_data()](NavigationServer2D.md#NavigationServer2D_method_parse_source_geometry_data) and [NavigationServer2D.bake_from_source_geometry_data()](NavigationServer2D.md#NavigationServer2D_method_bake_from_source_geometry_data) instead.

Creates polygons from the outlines added in the editor or by script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_remove_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_outline**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_remove_outline)

Removes an outline created in the editor or by script. You have to call [make_polygons_from_outlines()](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_method_make_polygons_from_outlines) for the polygons to update.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_set_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_outline**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md), outline\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_set_outline)

Changes an outline created in the editor or by script. You have to call [make_polygons_from_outlines()](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_method_make_polygons_from_outlines) for the polygons to update.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_set_parsed_collision_mask_value"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_parsed_collision_mask_value**\ (\ layer_number\: [int](int.md), value\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_set_parsed_collision_mask_value)

Based on `value`, enables or disables the specified layer in the [parsed_collision_mask](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_property_parsed_collision_mask), given a `layer_number` between 1 and 32.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="NavigationPolygon_method_set_vertices"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_vertices**\ (\ vertices\: [PackedVector2Array](PackedVector2Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#NavigationPolygon_method_set_vertices)

Sets the vertices that can be then indexed to create polygons with the [add_polygon()](NavigationPolygon.md#NavigationPolygon_method_add_polygon) method.
